p: The recommended minimum dose for one patient is one unit (200 mL per unit) of CCP. Second unit can be administered 48 h following the completion of the transfusion of the first unit of convalescent plasma and can be administered up to a maximum of 3 units (600 mL). The decision for the total dose is taken by the physician in charge and based on the clinical and laboratory findings of the patient. Scientific rationale of this application is to avoid volume overload in these patients who are instable in terms of cardiopulmonary functions [ 16].
